timeline.bodyText: Not sure about the checklist. I'm afraid it will be confusing most of the times because it will stay in the description unchecked. In reality both checklist items have 3 states: -1) not applicable, 0) required but not included, 1) included. So I'm afraid that for reviewer it will be confusing whether an empty checkbox means 0 and the PR is blocked on that or it means -1.
